REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Permits Gold Star families to use any of the public campsites, parks and other public places of recreation in this state free of charge
Summary: Permits Gold Star families to use any of the public campsites, parks and other public places of recreation in this state free of charge; defines "veteran".
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง13.19, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to Gold Star families
